process.title: Authentication Flow Debugging
process.description: Systematically traced OAuth redirects to identify exact failure points, leading to faster resolution

process.title: Frontend-Backend Coordination
process.description: Coordinated changes across both frontend and backend simultaneously for authentication system

process.title: Systematic Navigation Debugging
process.description: Following user error reports step-by-step and analyzing working vs broken component patterns accelerated root cause identification

process.title: User-Driven Testing Loop
process.description: Real-time user testing with immediate feedback enabled rapid validation and iterative adjustment cycles

efficiency.title: Parallel Development Approach
efficiency.description: Working on backend authentication while simultaneously updating frontend reduced overall implementation time

efficiency.title: Template Reuse Strategy
efficiency.description: Leveraging existing page layouts (signup page structure) for new registration page significantly sped up development

efficiency.title: Parallel Tool Usage for Information Gathering
efficiency.description: Using parallel tool calls for reading multiple files and searching patterns simultaneously reduced investigation time

efficiency.title: Surgical Fix Approach
efficiency.description: Applied targeted fixes rather than broad refactoring, minimizing risk and implementation time while solving core issues

patterns.title: DTO-First Development
patterns.description: Creating comprehensive DTOs with validation first made subsequent endpoint implementation more reliable

patterns.title: Guard-Driven Security
patterns.description: Implementing guards and decorators early in the process ensured security was built-in rather than added later

patterns.title: Framework Convention Analysis
patterns.description: Vue.js event modifiers can interfere with framework navigation methods - analyzing working vs broken patterns revealed consistent interaction issues

patterns.title: Defensive Null Safety Implementation
patterns.description: Client-side data transformation should include UX considerations - implement null safety defensively at component level

blockers.title: OAuth Investigation Time
blockers.description: Significant time spent investigating GreenHeart OAuth before determining it was completely non-functional

blockers.title: Layout Iteration Cycles
blockers.description: Multiple iterations needed for frontend layout fixes based on user visual feedback

blockers.title: Framework Navigation Interference
blockers.description: Event modifier conflicts with navigation methods caused systematic failures that were hard to diagnose initially

high_priority.title: Early OAuth Verification
high_priority.description: When working with external OAuth systems, verify functionality immediately before building dependent features

high_priority.title: Visual Design Review Protocol
high_priority.description: Include visual design review as standard step for any frontend changes to catch layout issues early

high_priority.title: Navigation Pattern Standardization
high_priority.description: Establish navigation patterns as coding standards - avoid .prevent modifiers with framework navigation methods

high_priority.title: Framework Convention Documentation
high_priority.description: Document framework interaction patterns to prevent similar event modifier conflicts in future development

medium_priority.title: Continue Parallel Frontend-Backend Development
medium_priority.description: Maintain coordinated development approach for authentication-related features

medium_priority.title: Progressive Integration Testing
medium_priority.description: Test integration points immediately after implementation rather than at the end

medium_priority.title: Automated Navigation Testing
medium_priority.description: Implement automated testing for navigation flows to prevent regression of core user experience

low_priority.title: Authentication Flow Documentation
low_priority.description: Consider implementing authentication flow documentation that updates automatically with code changes

low_priority.title: Reusable Data Protection Utilities
low_priority.description: Create reusable utilities for consistent null handling and data validation across components
